posts.post_content:
ALL cards are sold!

Hello All!

I just got back some freshly-graded T205s!

ALL cards are Blue Piedmont Factory 25 backs, unless noted. 

BATCH – Hassan 649 – SGC 35 – $50 - SOLD!

[STRIKE]DEVLIN – Green Sovereign 25 – SGC 40 – $35[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

[STRIKE]EGAN – Green Sovereign 25 – SGC 30 – $30[/STRIKE] - SOLD

McCONNELL – Hassan 649 – SCG 55 – $65 - SOLD!

RICHIE – SGC 45 – [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!
Only Richie of the CUbbies remains - Price Reduced - Can You Use Him?
ALL cards are sold!  Thank you for your interest!
